title: NIT Patna Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Junior Research Fellow Post
description: The National Institute of Technology (NIT) Patna has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/M. Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering can apply for the NIT Patna Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible aspirants can ap...
